subject: Re: Comparing arrays...
msgSnippet: ... Excellent. It always helps to have more pairs of eyes. This should be sufficient until such time as it isn t, then do more. :) Thanks, Neil. JBR.
messageBody:
>I always compare arrays like this:
>
>assertEquals( Arrays.asList(array1), Arrays.asList(array2) );
>
>Not very helpful diagnostics if the array length is long but it is simple.

Excellent. It always helps to have more pairs of eyes. This should be
sufficient until such time as it isn't, then do more. :)

Thanks, Neil.

JBR.
